images.caption: The North and the location of the crofters\' village[1]
Depiction of the crofters\' village by BryndenBFish

name: Crofters' village
summary: The crofters' village is a village located in the wolfswood west of Winterfell. It is inhabited by crofters and consists of a few huts, a longhall, and a watchtower by the lakeshore, as the village is located between two lakes.[2] The larger lake is dotted with small wooded islands, one of which has an ancient weirwood heart tree growing on it.[3] The longhall has space to comfortably seat fifty men.
